short_desc: Comprehensive library services including computers with Internet access
description: Approximately 75,000 books, compact disks, videos, DVDs, audio books, video games, and magazines and newspapers for all ages. Circulating materials are largely of popular interest, with a strong emphasis on practical how-to topics and fiction.Branch features eight computers with internet access for public use. Adaptive technology is available, including screen readers and enlargers for those that are blind or have low vision learning disabilities.
